# chorrrin

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `chorrrin` is to provide helpers (prompts for the [`chores` package addin](https://simonpcouch.github.io/chores/articles/custom.html#extension-packages)). 

## Installation

You can install the development version of `chorrrin` from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("mjfrigaard/chorrrin")
```

## Example

The following prompts will be added to your `chores` addin:

```{r}
#| label: example
#| eval: false 
library(chorrrin)
```
